entry.title: cedricpierre/fluentity-core: Fluentity is a lightweight and flexible library for TypeScript/JavaScript applications to consume RESTFul API using models. It's inspired by Active Record and Laravel Eloquent. It provides a simple and intuitive way to interact with your API endpoints while maintaining type safety and following object-oriented principles.
entry.content: Fluentity is a lightweight and flexible library for TypeScript/JavaScript applications to consume RESTFul API using models. It's inspired by Active Record and Laravel Eloquent. It provides a simple and intuitive way to interact with your API endpoints while maintaining type safety and following object-oriented principles.

entry.title: hovsepyan021/fintech-apps: A collection of lightweight, embeddable Angular-based fintech tools built for seamless integration into modern web platforms. This project includes standalone apps such as a Webhook Viewer, IBAN Validator, and more all designed to simplify financial operations and testing workflows.
entry.content: A collection of lightweight, embeddable Angular-based fintech tools built for seamless integration into modern web platforms. This project includes standalone apps such as a Webhook Viewer, IBAN Validator, and more all designed to simplify financial operations and testing workflows.

entry.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
entry.content: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
